default={{fg}}

# Status colors
OK={{green}}

WARNING={{orange}}
CRITICAL={{red}}

# Interface colors
title={{blue}}
help={{aqua}}

# Process colors
process={{fg}}
process_high={{red}}

# Filesystem colors
filesystem_used={{orange}}

# Network colors
